name: realtime-agrupa-trajetos
description: isola pedaços de trajetos a cada desligamento ou mudança de itinerario

scripts.redis:gui: docker run -d --hostname redis-scommander --name redis-commander -p 8081:8081 -e REDIS_HOSTS=local:redis:6379 rediscommander/redis-commander:latest
scripts.stop:redis: docker stop redis-srv && docker rm redis-srv
scripts.stop:rabbitmq: docker stop rabbitmq-srv && docker rm rabbitmq-srv
scripts.stop:mssql: docker stop sql-server-persistent && docker rm sql-server-persistent
scripts.stop:all: docker stop $(docker ps -q -a) && docker rm $(docker ps -q -a)

author: Mateus Garcia

validate-commit-msg.helpMessage: Use "npm run commit" instead, we use conventional-changelog format :) (https://github.com/commitizen/cz-cli)
